sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.resources

Class AbstractResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.AbstractManager
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.resources.AbstractResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Nameable, Manager, ResourceManager

    public abstract class AbstractResourceManager
extends AbstractManager
implements ResourceManager
    An abstract implementation of ResourceManager. This class implements the resource registration mechanism based on an underlying SetMultimap of listener types to registered resources.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
